borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Non-material amendments to planning permission reference: 2020/01849/FUL dated 16th September 2021 for the "Change of use from office to 33 residential units across Blocks 1-5; including partial demolition and extensions at ground/first floor to blocks 2/3, and at first floor in block 4. Partial demolition and alterations to block 5 and redevelopment of a 3-storey block; with associated bike storage, refuse storage, parking and landscaping and work to trees."  Amendments to the wording of description of development to read as follows: "Change of use from office to residential across Blocks 1-5; including partial demolition and extensions at ground/first floor to blocks 2/3, and at first floor in block 4. Partial demolition and alterations to block 5 and redevelopment of a 3-storey block; with associated bike storage, refuse storage, parking and landscaping and work to trees; single storey gatehouse building in front garden; alterations to existing fenestration."
